title: (x) Monolinear (monospaced?) slab - probably custom by Hi, similar to Kettler {Rasmus, Chris K}
content:
Does anyone know what font these characters are from??

[http://www.designworklife.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/04/hi\_01.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202041216/http:/www.designworklife.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/04/hi_01.jpg "http://www.designworklife.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/04/hi\_01.jpg")

Thanks in advance
author: Scott Waring

comments.content: It was made by the Swiss studio 'Hi', try asking them [http://www.hi-web.ch/#](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202041216/http:/www.hi-web.ch/#)

Thank you very much, that's brilliant I shall get in touch with them and find out :D

Thanks again,  
All the best,  
Scott
Looks like a customized version of [Kettler](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202041216/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/kettler/index.html), the 2 is different.
